inclusion.criterion: clinical diagnosis of acute exacerbation of COPD
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: radiological and microbiological evidence of pneumonia with co-existing COPD
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: significant co-morbidity that could limit exercise training & testing
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: attendance at a pulmonary rehabilitation programme in the preceding year
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and recent XRT, which may limit exercise training & testing. Also, patient is experiencing worsening dysphagia for solids and poor oral intake.
